about_the_game:
By purchasing this DLC you immediately get access to the entire content of the game without any restrictions on the level of the player's profile.
In CarX Drift Racing Online - Deluxe includes:
  • Free access to all traks without any level restrictions
  • Free access to all vehicles without any level restrictions
  • Free access to all elements of customization of the body of the car without any level restrictions
  • Free access to all discs without any level restrictions
This DLC does not include the content from other DLC's.

name: CarX Drift Racing Online - Deluxe

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy CarX Drift Racing Online - Deluxe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 или AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB (GeForce 950GT / AMD R9 270)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050GTX 4 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.

short_description: By purchasing this DLC you immediately get access to the entire content of the game without any restrictions on the level of the player's profile.This DLC does not include the content from other DLC's!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese
